price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Iganira kandi abantu warungitsweko ku nkuru ya Ibrahimu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) iri muri Qor’ani, mu vy’ukuri Ibrahimu yari imvugakuri koko, akaba n’Umuvugishwamana;
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
